titleStmt.title: The figvre of seven very pleasant to reade, plaine to vnderstand, and profitable to practise / by M.P. ; three, foure, five, six, sufficient proofe have given of their acceptance, what should hinder seven?
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.P. for Fr. Coles ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
